scripts.db:init: echo 'Please run: mysql -h YOUR_HOST -u YOUR_USER -pYOUR_PASSWORD YOUR_DATABASE < database/schema.sql'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:firebase: npm run build:firebase && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.switch:production: firebase use production && cp firebase.json.production firebase.json
scripts.switch:russian: firebase use russian && cp firebase.json.russian firebase.json
